bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of an extremely serious type of xi du 溪毒 , rivulet poison, conditions. The skin develops deep-reaching sores. When the root of the sores is pulled out it resembles the feelers of shrimps. The prognosis of such sores is inauspicious. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry shu yu niao 鸀鳿鳥：須臾即根入至骨，其根拔出如蝦須，瘡號蝦須瘡 , “Immediately the root enters and reaches the bones. When this root is pulled out it looks like the feelers of a shrimp. Such sores are called ‘ shrimp-feelers sores ’”. Xia xu xiao ke 下虛消渴 , melting with thirst associated with depletion below [4] Pathological Condition identical with xia xiao 下消 , lower melting. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry niu 牛 quoting ZYJYGLF : 消渴，心脾中熱，下焦虛冷，小便多 , “Melting with thirst, heat in the heart and spleen. The lower burner is depleted and cold. Urination is increased”, writes: 下虛消渴：心脾中熱，下焦虛冷，小便多 , “ Melting with thirst associated with depletion below : heat in the heart and spleen. The lower burner is depleted and cold. Urination is increased”.
